desc: 3llis Production is a Jamaican born record producer, videographer, & U.S Marine veteran from Broward County, FL. A producer of Hip-Hop, Dancehall, Trap, R&B & Afro pop. 3llis Production Has done works with Zaytoven, Nas, Lil Gotit, Tory Lanez, Jasmin Cadavid, Newage Jerkboy, Mondell, Gr8ness, Benga Tribe and more.

layout.text: Marlon Andrew Ellis (born May, 5 1997), professionally known as 3llis Production (pronounced Ellis Production). 3llis Production is a Jamaican born music producer, videographer, photographer & U.S Marine veteran from Broward County, FL. A producer of Hip-Hop, Dancehall, R&B & Afro pop. 3llis Production Has done works with Zaytoven, Ace Hood, Jackboy, Tory Lanez, DJ Lyve, Fabulous, Turbulence, Mondell, Gr8ness, Solo Island, Newage Jerk boy, & Benga Tribe.
